# CAM::DESTROY_CAM

## Summary
Destroy a single script-controlled camera.

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** cameraIndex
* **BOOL** shouldApplyAcrossAllThreads = false:
If true, the specified script-controlled camera is destroyed, no matter which script thread owns it.
Note that this can result in conflicts between concurrent script threads, so this must be used with caution.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
BOOL param indicates whether the cam should be destroyed if it belongs to the calling script.
